ivardefs.name: action
ivardefs.desc: Describes the action that was taken or the observation that was made that reduces/eliminates the risk associated with the identified issue.

ivardefs.name: author
ivardefs.desc: Identifies the practitioner who determined the mitigation and takes responsibility for the mitigation step occurring.

ivardefs.name: date
ivardefs.desc: Indicates when the mitigating action was documented.

properties.desc: Indicates an action that has been taken or is committed to reduce or eliminate the likelihood of the risk identified by the detected issue from manifesting.  Can also reflect an observation of known mitigating factors that may reduce/eliminate the need fo
